directions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add squash, basil, oregano, thyme, and garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute. Pour in wine; cook for 1 minute more.
Remove skillet from heat and stir in green chile sauce. Let stand, covered, until flavors combine, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: 6 ounces green chile sauce (such as Coyote Trail®)
title: Impressive Quick and Easy Squash Blossoms
